extension.description:
This is a proof of concept build based on MAME v0.78. MAME stands for [B]M[/B]ultiple [B]A[/B]rcade [B]M[/B]achine [B]E[/B]mulator. MAME can currently emulate several thousand different classic arcade video games from the late 1970s through the modern era.
Supported files: .zip
Icon credit: peter-86 (peter-86.deviantart.com)
Source: https://github.com/libretro/mame078-libretro
